docs.snippet: More than half of the South American republics have declared an armistice in their economic war and begun tearing down their high tariff walls. This new policy has been adopted by six of the republics since the adjournment in December of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than half of the South American republics have declared an armistice in their economic war and begun tearing down their high tariff walls. This new policy has been adopted by six of the republics since the adjournment in December of the Pan-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace.

docs.snippet: The Tri-Partite Preparatory Textile Conference, the first one convoked by the International Labor Organization since the United States became a member of it in 1934, will open here tomorrow with delegates from twenty-three nations present.

docs.snippet: THIS year is the sesquicentennial of the ratification of the Amer ican Constitution, which is to be commemorated by a special stamp issue. Although no definite plans have been made, it has been suggested that a complete set be issued, picturing...
docs.lead_paragraph: THIS year is the sesquicentennial of the ratification of the Amer ican Constitution, which is to be commemorated by a special stamp issue. Although no definite plans have been made, it has been suggested that a complete set be issued, picturing various scenes which occurred in formulating the document.
docs.abstract: Issue for sequicentennial of Constitution suggested
